re PR fortran/38291 (Rejects I/O with POS= if FMT=*)

2008-12-06  Jerry DeLisle  <jvdelisle@gcc.gnu.org>

	ommitted.  Add check for invalid use of REC= with ACCESS="stream".  Fix
	comment.
